jexxus.common
Class ByteReader

java.lang.Object
  jexxus.common.ByteReader

public class ByteReader
extends java.lang.Object

Used for reading many forms of data. This is useful for reading objects from over a network or from a file which have been previously serialized.

Author:
Jason

          Constructs a new reader for the given data.
